channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Age of Whispered Conversations
item.description: Trump was a vehicle for what people are afraid to say out loud.

item.title: Texas proposal would give public schools the option to use Bible teachings in lessons

item.title: Judge strikes down Wyoming abortion laws, including explicit ban on pills to end pregnancy
item.description: A state judge on Monday struck down Wyoming's overall ban on abortion and its first-in-the-nation explicit prohibition on the use of medication to end...

item.title: How Union Leaders Overplayed Their Hand and Helped Fuel Democrats’ Downfall
item.description: The same workers who were once the backbone of the party now feel betrayed.

item.title: Kamala Was Not One for Women
item.description: The Heritage Foundation shines a light on the dangers of abortion pills.

item.title: Due To Staffer Error, Dem-Controlled Pennsylvania Board Tosses 142 Ballots In Trump Stronghold
item.description: The Democrat-led Luzerne County Election Board voted to reject 142 mail-in ballots from a Trump stronghold in Pennsylvania.

item.title: House Republicans eye FEMA fund overhaul ahead of high-stakes hearing on Helene recovery
item.description: Rep. Gary Palmer is leading new legislation to replenish FEMA disaster relief funding using unspent funds the agency has elsewhere.

item.title: Ted Olson, R.I.P.
item.description: Ted will be sorely missed by his friends, his profession, and the country.

item.title: Senate GOP initiates Thune-engineered slow down as Schumer looks to stack judicial votes
item.description: Republicans sought to delay Democrats' cloture filings on Monday as they try to quickly confirm Biden judges in the lame duck session.

item.title: Media Lie About Pete Hegseth’s Christian Faith To Falsely Smear Him As Racist
item.description: The ultimate goal is to manifest controversy around the Army veteran to scare enough GOP senators into tanking his nomination.

item.title: Don’t Let Trump’s Decisive Victory Lull You Into A False Sense Of Election Security
item.description: The incoming Trump administration must make election integrity a top priority through federal legislation or persuading states to pass reforms.

item.title: We Know This Confuses Some People
item.description: But our only loyalty is to our readers.

item.description: For Democrats, the bond of party is stronger than the will of the people or the rule of law.

item.title: Rep. Nancy Mace introduces resolution to ban transgender women from female restrooms in Capitol
item.description: Rep. Nancy Mace introduced a resolution Monday to prohibit transgender women from using female bathrooms at the Capitol.

item.title: Pennsylvania Supreme Court Once Again Rules Counties Shall Not Count Illegal Ballots
item.description: In its decision, the PA Supreme Court ordered that all counties, “SHALL COMPLY with the prior rulings of this Court.'

item.title: Pennsylvania Dem Gov. Josh Shapiro sides with state supreme court ruling not to count certain mail-in ballots
item.description: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro came out Monday and sided with the state's supreme court over a ruling about the counting of mail-in ballots.
